Jesus Christ, why do all channels say that BT in the shower in Death Stranding is an easter egg for PT? It's just a nightmare, that jerky movement and floating pose were in a game from the start. Kojima used this freaking out animation before and noone was up in arms how it's PT related.
I appreciate how Kraid flips the bird as part of his death animation. That is to say, 'if' he did have a thumb; that last digit he was hanging on with would be the middle one.
loved the video, have a good halloween James!
